page.title: 07Buckden School, Information
page.content: Buckden C.E Primary School has 142 Infants and 213 Junior children from Buckden and Southoe.A school bus transports the children to and from Southoe.School starts at 09:00hrs. with assembly followed by lessons until 10:40hrs when there is a break for 15mins. Lunch time is from 12:00hrs to 13:15hrs. School lunch costs 60p.for infants and 65p.for Juniors providing a wide choice of meals. Other children bring a packed lunch or go home at lunch time. Afternoon school ends at 15:15hrs. The school has its own playing field as well as a learner (outdoor) swimming pool which is used in the summer term. The Parent Teachers Association has built a greenhouse on the field and are raising money for a play-fort.
